title: I would like to thank Riot for
body:
Not trying to buff Magus and accidentally putting us in a mage meta. Not that it wouldn't be funny to see.

{{champion:9}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:31}}

replies.body: Oh look more click bait XD
Why is poppy included in your list of mages?
She can jungle, and she can build AP (there's zero reason to ever do it because it means you can only burst one carry instead of 2, but if Magus was ridiculous enough...)
